nodes.documentation:
@title SafeMath
@dev Math operations with safety checks that throw on error
nodes.name: SafeMath

nodes.documentation: @dev Multiplies two numbers, throws on overflow.
nodes.name: mul

nodes.documentation: @dev Integer division of two numbers, truncating the quotient.
nodes.name: div

nodes.documentation: @dev Subtracts two numbers, throws on overflow (i.e. if subtrahend is greater than minuend).
nodes.name: sub

nodes.documentation: @dev Adds two numbers, throws on overflow.
nodes.name: add

nodes.documentation:
@title Basic token
@dev Basic version of StandardToken, with no allowances.
nodes.name: BasicToken

nodes.documentation: @dev total number of tokens in existence

nodes.documentation:
* Lynked World LYNK Token
Creation Date : 06-Sep-2018
by Saravana, TokenSafe.io
nodes.name: LYNKToken

nodes.documentation: Emergency Stop or Start ICO.
nodes.name: halt

nodes.documentation:
ERC 20 Standard Token interface transfer function
     * Prevent transfers until ICO period is over.

     * Transfer 
   - Allow 50% after six months for Founders and Advisors
   - Allow Investors and Others after ICO end date 
     * Applicable tests:
     * - Test restricted early transfer
- Test transfer after restricted period
nodes.name: transfer
